definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

sentences.english: However, there is well known saying:" telling the possible ugly words before you begin."
sentences.chinese: 可是不要忘了另一句俗語“把醜話說在前面”。

sentences.english: Although honored guests of compose a quarrel are very good friend, but ugly word says thereinbefore .
sentences.chinese: 雖然說和嘉賓們都是很好的朋友，但醜話說前頭。
